-spec good_subsetof_binary_matrix(Grid :: [[integer()]]) -> [integer()].
good_subsetof_binary_matrix(Grid) ->
    lists:foldl(fun(Row, Acc) -> 
                    case is_good_subset([Row|Acc], Grid) of
                        true -> [Row|Acc];
                        false -> Acc
                    end
                end, [], lists:seq(0, length(Grid) - 1)).

is_good_subset(SubsetIndices, Grid) ->
    Subset = [lists:nth(Index + 1, Grid) || Index <- SubsetIndices],
    Transposed = transpose(Subset),
    AllColumnsGood = lists:all(fun(Column) ->
                                    Sum = lists:sum(Column),
                                    Sum =< length(Column) div 2
                                end, Transposed),
    AllColumnsGood.

transpose([]) -> [];
transpose([[]|_]) -> [];
transpose(Matrix) ->
    [lists:map(fun hd/1, Matrix) | transpose(lists:map(fun tl/1, Matrix))].
